title: Southern fried chicken in buttermilk
description: Buttermilk tenderises the chicken in this classy version of an all-American feast: fried chicken with cooked lettuce, sourdough croutons and creamy ranch dressing.Equipment and preparation: you will need a deep-fat fryer for this recipe.
ingredients: handful broken herb stalks such as coriander, parsley and tarragon
8 organic chicken thighs, skin removed but kept, boneless, halved, sinew removed
2g mixed dried parsley, dill and chives
1 loaf sourdough bread, broken into small pieces
2 heads Baby Gem, halved lengthways, any dark outer leaves discarded
9 round radishes, cut in half with the leaves attached
